template.description: this flow is used to reset counter and drop queue data in the flow.
template.name: flow10

entry.value:
require "json" require "net/http" require "uri" def remove_wait_and_resetcounter(session) begin uri = URI.parse("http://10.254.183.161:9090/nifi-api/counters/f8d71e51-5026-38f6-b717-7f719438c79d") http_reset_count = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port) request_reset_count= Net::HTTP::Put.new(uri.request_uri) response_reset_count = http_reset_count.request(request_reset_count) puts response_reset_count.body result_resetcounter = JSON.parse(response_reset_count.body) reset_value= result_resetcounter['counter']['value'] if reset_value.to_i > 0 return "400" end rescue Timeout::Error, Errno::EINVAL, Errno::ECONNRESET, EOFError, Net::HTTPBadResponse, Net::HTTPHeaderSyntaxError, Net::ProtocolError => e return "400" end
begin uri = URI.parse("http://10.254.183.161:9090/nifi-api/flowfile-queues/16053d7e-325e-1d0a-4291-1400b8769021/drop-requests") http_reset_count = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port) request_reset_count= Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri) response_reset_count = http_reset_count.request(request_reset_count) if response_reset_count.code != "202" return "400" end rescue Timeout::Error, Errno::EINVAL, Errno::ECONNRESET, EOFError, Net::HTTPBadResponse, Net::HTTPHeaderSyntaxError, Net::ProtocolError => e return "400" end return "202" end
flowFile = session.get()
debugvarlocal = remove_wait_and_resetcounter(session) if debugvarlocal=="202" flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "debug_att", "remove_wait_and_resetcounter SUCCESS" + debugvarlocal) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) session.commit() else flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "debugatt", "remove_wait_and_resetcounter FAILURE" + debugvarlocal) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_FAILURE) session.commit() end
